caption.title: Nucleotide changes across Coronaviridae strains.
caption.p: ( A to C) Number of SNVs for each nucleotide change and ( D to F) local sequence context for C-to-U edited sites in genome alignments from SARS-CoV-2 (A and D), human-hosted MERS-CoV (B and E), and human-hosted SARS-CoV (C and F).
